= Introduction =
 * Author: Bast
 * shows a miniwindow when noexp is toggled

= Installation ==
 * Required 
  * [miniwin] and its dependencies
  * [pluginhelper] and its dependencies
  * [ldplugin]
  * [broadcast_noexp]
 * see the [Download] Page, and copy the file into worlds\plugins\Aardwolf

= Troubleshooting =
 * if you do not see the window, "bnoexp Noexp toggle"

= Screenshots =
 http://bastmush.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/noexp/noexp.png

= Help =
 * "bnoexp Noexp toggle" to toggle the window
 {{{
/*
miniwin_noexp v1 Noexp Commands
-----------------------------------------------
debug          : toggle debugging
fonts          : show fonts loaded in this miniwin
help           : show help
reset          : reset settings to default values
save           : save plugin variables
set            : set settings
toggle         : toggle window
*/
 }}}
